Generate xor key with command cyclic(1000) or pwn cyclic 1000
(P.S. The cyclic function is part of the pwntools library, it basically creates a pattern of a specified length. Usually, its used in Pwn and Reverse Engineering, and the cyclic pattern is beneficial because it provides a quick and reliable way to determine the exact location of a buffer overflow. In this case, it is adapted to a cryptography challenge instead.)
Go to Cyberchef and put XOR in recipe with key as 
It will output flag to be YCEP24{ImG01nGT0CyCl3ToUrHse}
